channel.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W7QHS8LZFHo
The game is being developed by Obsidian Entertainment and will be continuing the storyline of the first two Fallout games. No it is not Fallout 4, it's a spin-off from the creators of the original Fallout games before the rights were sold to Bethesda.

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Frell:

If Sony would fuck off and microsoft would make an xbox that wont break and charge a little less or have free servers then everything would be fine.

In a perfect world.

But i think New Vegas won’t be so bad, it will certainly be different, but i do have to get it for sure, Fallout 3 was awesome, but i got bored of it too easily.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Theres something PC and (mostly) PS3 gamers need to understand. If the game crashes and is buggy, its not because the game sucks, its because your console sucks. Most games are made for the XBox 360 and when they’re done they get ported to PS3 and PC so they might suck a little.

If Sony would fuck off and microsoft would make an xbox that wont break and charge a little less or have free servers then everything would be fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

On the 360 its fine, it just(for me) takes forever to load the custom content. other then that it runs fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Frell:

On pc?

There was alot of compatibility problems on the PC but the GOTY on the PS3 was apparently unplayable because it crashed so often.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:10, topic:343993”][quote author=Frell link=topic=440373.msg3235948#msg3235948 date=1276478656]
For you. Never crashed for me and all the addons were excellent. It was far from sloppy to, it actually felt like a wasteland. NV looks like they just threw textures on and called it done, on fallout 3 they have tons of little details everywhere and the hideouts actually made sense.
[/quote]
Not just for me. You can research all the people having problems with the GOTY edition, problems with GFWL crashing the game, sounds skipping, random colors flashing on the screen, etc.[/quote]
On pc?

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

The only problem I have with that addon’s are that it takes for ever to load.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Frell:

For you. Never crashed for me and all the addons were excellent. It was far from sloppy to, it actually felt like a wasteland. NV looks like they just threw textures on and called it done, on fallout 3 they have tons of little details everywhere and the hideouts actually made sense.

Not just for me. You can research all the people having problems with the GOTY edition, problems with GFWL crashing the game, sounds skipping, random colors flashing on the screen, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:

Damn it Rixxx

and I am still going to get it to try it out, but ye its sloppy.
[/quote]
They still got a couple months to polish the game

You guys should also watch:

Good times <3 Its a shame obsidian is making it worse.[/quote]
Yeah true, I still like fallout though, so it should prove to be interesting, thats for sure.

item.title: Fallout: New Vegas gamplay trailer
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:5, topic:343993”]Damn it Rixxx

and I am still going to get it to try it out, but ye its sloppy.[/quote]
They still got a couple months to polish the game

You guys should also watch:

Good times <3 Its a shame obsidian is making it worse.

[quote=“Kihomura, post:6, topic:343993”]Honestly, if you think about it, Fallout 3 was sloppy too. They released very few patches and it crashed often.

also derp rocket[/quote]
For you. Never crashed for me and all the addons were excellent. It was far from sloppy to, it actually felt like a wasteland. NV looks like they just threw textures on and called it done, on fallout 3 they have tons of little details everywhere and the hideouts actually made sense.

Fallout3_6.jpg1000×800

Not that sloppy compared to NV

Read full topic

item.description:

The Reaper X:

Looks good, just a little sloppy.

Yea, Bethesda this time teamed up with Obsidian, which are known for creating very sloppy games and are usually unfinished and buggy.

Just watched the video. It looks like shit. Ill probably still get it though.
